expirationPeriod.description: Number of days after which expiry date should be set in relation to the transaction date. Accept value is ND, where N is number of days.

maturityDateConvention.description: Specifies the date convention for the maturity date calculation. When DATE.CONVENTION is specified, holiday calendar will be checked against date convention specified for the account. Otherwise the business calendar will be used for checking holidays.

placeFullHold.description: Indicates if a full hold has to be placed on the account. When set to Y  any future credits made to be account will be locked automatically
